#summary How to Release Se Grid

= Introduction =

The steps to releasing Se Grid from GitHub.  _This will need to be updated when the code moves into SVN._


= Details =

  # Make sure tests are passing on master
  # Update the Changelog
  # Update the project.properties to use the new version number
  # Update hub/src/main/java/com/thoughtworks/selenium/grid/hub/management/console/index.html to use the new version number
  # Tag the release in git
  # Push the tag up to GitHub
  # Build the distribution: ant dist
  # Upload the distribution to /tmp on releases.seleniumhq.org
  # Become the release user (sudo su - release) and copy the distribution to release.openqa.org/htdocs/selenium-grid/
  # Become your regular user account and remove the file you uploaded to /tmp
  # Update website release page
  # Test download
  # Make announcement on user list
